feature_model.name: Trek Road Bikes

meta.data: This feature models describes the features of a simple bike

feature_model.feature_tree: :r Bike (bike) :m frame (frame) :g [1,1] : aluminium (_frame_aluminium) : carbon (_frame_carbon) :o pedal (pedal) :g [1,1] : pedal A (_pedal_pedala) : pedal B (_pedal_pedalb)
